\BLOCK{endif}

\BLOCK{endif}

\makecvheader[C]

\BLOCK{for section_name in config.section_order}
\BLOCK{if section_name == 'experience' and experience}
\cvsection{Experience}
\begin{cventries}
\BLOCK{for exp in experience}
  \cventry
    {\VAR{exp.position}}
    {\VAR{exp.company}}
    {\VAR{exp.location}}
    {\VAR{exp.dates}}
    {
      \begin{cvitems}
\BLOCK{for detail in exp.details}
        \item{\VAR{detail}}
\BLOCK{endfor}
      \end{cvitems}
    }
    {\VAR{exp.keywords}}
\BLOCK{endfor}
\end{cventries}%
\BLOCK{endif}
\BLOCK{if section_name == 'projects' and projects}
\cvsection{Projects}
\begin{cvprojects}
\BLOCK{for proj in projects}
  \cvproject
    {\VAR{proj.name}}
    {\VAR{proj.date}}
    {
      \begin{cvitems}
\BLOCK{for detail in proj.details}
        \item{\VAR{detail}}
\BLOCK{endfor}
      \end{cvitems}
    }
    {\VAR{proj.keywords}}
\BLOCK{endfor}
\end{cvprojects}
\BLOCK{endif}
\BLOCK{if section_name == 'education' and education}
\cvsection{Education}
\begin{cveducation}
\BLOCK{for edu in education}
  \cveditems
    {\VAR{edu.degree}}
    {\VAR{edu.major}}
    {\VAR{edu.institution}, \VAR{edu.location}}
    {\VAR{edu.date}}
    {\VAR{edu.grade}}
\BLOCK{endfor}
\end{cveducation}
\BLOCK{endif}
\BLOCK{if section_name == 'research' and research}
\cvsection{Research}
\begin{cvskills}
\BLOCK{for res in research}
  \cvskill
    {\VAR{res.title}}
    {\VAR{res.date}}
\BLOCK{endfor}
\end{cvskills}
\BLOCK{endif}
\BLOCK{if section_name == 'skills' and skills}
\cvsection{Skills}
\begin{cvskills}
\BLOCK{for skill in skills}
  \cvskill
    {\VAR{skill.category}}
    {\VAR{skill['items']}}
\BLOCK{endfor}
\end{cvskills}
\BLOCK{endif}
\BLOCK{endfor}
